fabric.dissemination

Class ObjectGlob

  • java.lang.Object
    • fabric.dissemination.AbstractGlob<ObjectGroup>
      • fabric.dissemination.ObjectGlob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FastSerializable

    public class ObjectGlob
extends AbstractGlob<ObjectGroup>
    An object glob is an ObjectGroup that has been encrypted and signed.

      Deserializer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ObjectGlob

        public ObjectGlob(Store store,
                  ObjectGroup group,
                  java.security.PrivateKey key)
        Used by the store to encrypt and sign an object group.
        Parameters:
        store - The store at which the group resides.
        group - The group to encapsulate.
        key - The store's private key. Used to sign the glob.

      • updateCache

        public boolean updateCache(Cache dissemCache,
                           RemoteStore store,
                           long onum)
        Description copied from class: AbstractGlob
        Updates the worker and dissemination caches with this glob. If the caches do not have entries for this glob, then nothing is changed.
        Specified by:
        updateCache in class AbstractGlob<ObjectGroup>
        Returns:
        true iff either cache was changed.
